description:
The RealFleece™ High Pile Long Sleeve Zip is a warm, super-cozy midlayer that combines a technical design with the natural benefits of merino wool. Made with a high-pile 100% merino wool fleece, that’s naturally soft, breathable and odor-resistant, this pullover also features icebreaker’s Cool-Lite™jersey in the lining, which combines natural TENCEL® and merino wool to manage moisture. Offset shoulder seams prevent friction while front hand pockets stash your essential items.

Superfine merino fibers are brushed to create icebreaker RealFleece®, a natural fleece that warms and breathes next to your skin. Silky-soft merino and TENCEL®, sourced from sustainable eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker cool-lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker RealFleece High Pile LS Zip - Mens

specs.value: 60% Lyocell, 40% Merino Wool - Exclusive Of Decoration
